Ironi Inter di Liga Champions: Setelah Unggul, Kalah Kemudian
07 Nov 2019, 06:08 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Inter Milan tak mampu mempertahankan keunggulan. (AP Photo/Martin Meissner)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Inter Milan mengalami ironi di Liga Champions musim ini. Skuat arahan Antonio Conte sering kali unggul lebih dulu namun harus mengakhiri laga dengan kekalahan.I Nerazzuri sebenarnya tampil lumayan di Liga Champions musim ini. Duet Lautaro Martinez dan Romelu Lukaku pun kian padu dan disegani tim-tim lawan.Lautaro jadi sosok yang paling menonjol di lini depan Inter musim ini setelah kepergian Mauro Icardi ke Paris Saint-Germain. Catatan tiga gol di empat laga membuktikan Lautaro sebagai salah satu striker tajam di Eropa.Namun, ketajaman Lautaro tampaknya kurang diimbangi kesolidan barisan pertahanan yang kini mengandalkan jam terbang bek senior Uruguay, Diego Godin.Kekalahan dari Borussia Dortmund pada laga keempat Grup F Liga Champions semakin menunjukkan celah di lini belakang. Sempat ungul 2-0 berkat Lautaro dan Matias Vecino di babak pertama, La Benemata kedodoran dan terpaksa menyerah 2-3 dari tuan rumah.Persoalan yang sama terjadi ketika Inter melawat ke Camp Nou, markas Barcelona,pada awal Oktober lalu. Lautaro bermain impresif dan sukses membawa Inter unggul 1-0 di babak pertama.Inter juga tidak bermain bertahan sepenuhnya saat melawan Barca. Conte benar-benar membuat permainan Inter menarik ditonton dan berani membangun serangan dari bawah alih-alih parkir bus di kandang raksasa Spanyol itu.Tapi, apa mau dikata. Para pemain bertahan Inter kalah cerdik dari Luis Suarez. Striker internasional Belgia itu mampu menciptakan dua gol cantik yang lolos dari kawalan Godin dkk.Meski bermain tak buruk di Catalunya, Inter harus menerima kekalahan 1-2 di pengujung laga. Unggul lebih dulu tapi kalah kemudian sepertinya jadi ironi Inter di Liga Champions musim ini.Saat ini Inter harus puas menempati posisi ketiga klasemen sementara Grup F Liga Champions dengan koleksi empat poin. Mereka tertinggal empat poin dari Barcelona yang berada di puncak dan tiga poin dari Dortmund di posisi kedua.Samir Handanovic dan kawan-kawan harus berjuang lebih keras jika ingin menjaga asa lolos fase grup. Artinya, mereka wajib mengalahkan Barcelona di Giuseppe Meazza dan tidak boleh seri atau kalah saat melawat ke rumah Slavia Praha. (jun)
text:
The irony of Inter in the Champions League: After winning, losing later
Nov 7 2019, 06:08 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Inter Milan are unable to maintain excellence. (AP Photo / Martin Meissner)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Inter Milan experience irony in the Champions League this season. Antonio Conte's direction is often ahead but must end the match with a defeat. Nerazzuri actually performed quite well in the Champions League this season. The duo of Lautaro Martinez and Romelu Lukaku were increasingly coherent and respected by opposing teams. Lautaro became the most prominent figure in the Inter front line this season after Mauro Icardi's departure for Paris Saint-Germain. A record of three goals in four matches proves Lautaro as one of the sharpest strikers in Europe. However, the sharpness of Lautaro seems to be offset by the solidity of the defense that now relies on the flying hours of Uruguay's senior defender Diego Godin. The defeat of Borussia Dortmund in the fourth match of the Champions League Group F increasingly showing a gap in the back line. Had a 2-0 ungul thanks to Lautaro and Matias Vecino in the first round, La Benemata saggy and forced to surrender 2-3 from the host. The same problem occurred when Inter visited the Camp Nou, Barcelona headquarters, in early October. Lautaro played impressively and successfully brought Inter to a 1-0 lead in the first round. Inter also did not play fully in defense against Barca. Conte really made Inter's game interesting to watch and dared to build an attack from below instead of parking the bus in the Spanish giant's enclosure. But, what can I say. The Inter defenders lost shrewdly to Luis Suarez. The Belgium international striker was able to create two beautiful goals that escaped escort from Godin et al. Although not playing badly in Catalunya, Inter must accept a 1-2 defeat at the end of the fight. Winning first but losing then seems to be the irony of Inter in the Champions League this season. At the moment Inter have to settle for third place in the Champions League Group F standings with a collection of four points. They are four points behind Barcelona at the top and three points behind Dortmund in second place. Samir Handanovic and his friends must fight harder if they want to keep their hopes of passing the group phase. That is, they must defeat Barcelona at the Giuseppe Meazza and must not draw or lose when visiting Slavia Prague. (jun)
